title: Blood Barrage

properties.value: Blood Barrage is the highest tier Blood spell from the Ancient Magicks spellbook, available at level 92 Magic. It is capable of hitting up to 29 damage (without any magic damage boosts) per cast.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Blood Barrage
Blood Barrage
Released 18 April 2005 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 92
Spellbook Ancient
Type Combat
Experience 51
Element Blood
Damage 29
Runes 4 4 1
Casting speed 5 ticks
Description A multi-target strong blood attack
Animation
Sound Effect

Blood Barrage is the highest tier Blood spell from the Ancient Magicks spellbook, available at level 92 Magic. It is capable of hitting up to 29 damage (without any magic damage boosts) per cast.

As with all:

  • Blood spells, it has the capability of healing the caster's Hitpoints by 25% of the amount of damage inflicted. Players can increase the amount healed by equipping bloodbark armour; each piece will increase the amount healed by 1.5%, up to a maximum overall of 32.5%.
  • Burst and Barrage spells, this spell hits up to nine targets in a 3x3 grid around its primary target.
  • Ancient Magicks spells, the quest Desert Treasure must be completed to cast this spell.

The spell is sometimes used alongside various other Barrage spells, such as Ice Barrage, in multi-combat PvP activities. This method is normally used by players with high Magic, Defence, and Hitpoints levels.

The spell is also used by players to extend longevity at a dangerous location. In the God Wars Dungeon, Blood Barrage is ideal for healing on bodyguards, such as Tstanon Karlak and Zakl'n Gritch in K'ril Tsutsaroth's chamber, as well as on Flight Kilisa and Flockleader Geerin in Kree'arra's chamber after their corresponding general is defeated, to conserve supplies. It is a popular spell to use in the Inferno mini game, the smaller clumped monsters work best, like such as nibblers or bloblets (Jal-AkRek-Ket, Jal-AkRek-Xil, and Jal-AkRek-Mej). Some players also use it on Spinolyps at Dagannoth Kings.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In terms of rune costs, Blood Barrage is the most expensive combat spell.

[[File:Blood Barrage icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Blood Barrage''' is the highest tier [[Blood spell]] from the [[Ancient Magicks]] spellbook, available at level 92 [[Magic]]. It is capable of hitting up to 29 damage (without any [[magic damage]] boosts) per cast.

As with all:
*[[Blood spells]], it has the capability of healing the caster's [[Hitpoints]] by 25% of the amount of damage inflicted. Players can increase the amount healed by equipping [[bloodbark armour]]; each piece will increase the amount healed by 1.5%, up to a maximum overall of 32.5%.
*[[Burst spells|Burst]] and [[Barrage spells]], this spell hits up to nine targets in a 3x3 grid around its primary target.
*[[Ancient Magicks]] spells, the quest [[Desert Treasure]] must be completed to cast this spell.

The spell is sometimes used alongside various other Barrage spells, such as [[Ice Barrage]], in multi-combat [[PvP]] activities. This method is normally used by players with high [[Magic]], [[Defence]], and Hitpoints levels.

The spell is also used by players to extend longevity at a dangerous location. In the [[God Wars Dungeon]], Blood Barrage is ideal for healing on bodyguards, such as [[Tstanon Karlak]] and [[Zakl'n Gritch]] in [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]]'s chamber, as well as on [[Flight Kilisa]] and [[Flockleader Geerin]] in [[Kree'arra]]'s chamber after their corresponding general is defeated, to conserve supplies. It is a popular spell to use in the [[Inferno]] mini game, the smaller clumped monsters work best, like such as [[Jal-Nib|nibblers]] or bloblets ([[Jal-AkRek-Ket]], [[Jal-AkRek-Xil]], and [[Jal-AkRek-Mej]]). Some players also use it on [[Spinolyp]]s at [[Dagannoth Kings]].
